title: Flipped Learning-Based Engineering Education Design and Application Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Engineering Concepts Comprehension and Smart Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: A systematic training course applying the flipped learning model to engineering education for the general public, emphasizing project-based learning centered on real-life problem-solving

learning_goals: One can apply the core principles of flipped learning (student-content, student-instructor, student-student interaction) to actual instructional design
One can develop three or more blended learning models combining digital platforms and offline activities
One can produce video lectures that promote learner engagement and operate a feedback system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
